capability.name: Transaction Engine
capability.definition: Orchestrate a schedule of payment transaction and reporting activities for the fulfillment of certain long term instruments or structured facilities
capability.role: The Service Domain provides a utility/background operational support service to orchestrate a schedule of payment transaction and reporting activities for the fulfillment of certain long term instruments or structured facilities. The Service Domain maintains a link to the associated fulfillment Service Domain and the applicable product instance for reporting and processing issues that may arise.
capability.example: The mortgage fulfillment Service Domain delegates repayment processing to the Transaction Engine for its active mortgage product instances

key_features.name: Establish the processing schedule for a product instance
key_features.description: Enables establish the processing schedule for a product instance to support orchestrate a schedule of payment transaction and reporting activities for the fulfillment of certain long term instruments or structured facilities

key_features.name: Process transaction and reporting tasks as necessary
key_features.description: Enables process transaction and reporting tasks as necessary to support orchestrate a schedule of payment transaction and reporting activities for the fulfillment of certain long term instruments or structured facilities

key_features.name: Escalate issues to the product fulfillment Service Domain as necessary
key_features.description: Enables escalate issues to the product fulfillment service domain as necessary to support orchestrate a schedule of payment transaction and reporting activities for the fulfillment of certain long term instruments or structured facilities

key_features.name: Report on transaction fulfillment activity
key_features.description: Enables report on transaction fulfillment activity to support orchestrate a schedule of payment transaction and reporting activities for the fulfillment of certain long term instruments or structured facilities
